name: Floppy Cons (v0.02)
description:
Just started game development, want to share my first ever project.
Willing to improve on the game.

Download Guide:
1. Download the rare file
2. Make a folder
3. Put the .rar file inside the folder
4. Right click the .rar file and click on extract here
5. Enter Floppy Cons folder
6. Click on backinbizznizz 
7. Enjoy
